scripts.release:major: changelog -M -u https://github.com/qxb3/mirage-helper && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'update CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m -u https://github.com/qxb3/mirage-helper && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'update CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:patch: changelog -p -u https://github.com/qxb3/mirage-helper && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'update CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
